AccountResource.description: An account represents a group of numbers, typically associated with an enterprise.

serviceProvisioningStatus.description: The status of the provisioning action associated with this resource.

serviceProvisioningErrors.description: Any errors pertaining to the provisioning of this resource.

correlationId.description: A user defined identifier used for correlating with external systems.

AccountServiceDetails.description: Details of the backend services associated with this Account.

teamsTenantId.description: The Microsoft Teams Tenant ID of the Account. This can only be updated if no Operator Connect or Teams Phone Mobile numbers are configured in this account.

teamsOperatorConnect.description: Details for the Teams Operator Connect service on this Account.

teamsDirectRouting.description: Details for the Teams Direct Routing service on this Account.

teamsPhoneMobile.description: Details for the Teams Phone Mobile service on this Account.

zoomPhoneCloudPeering.description: Details for the Zoom Phone Cloud Peering service on this Account.

azureOperatorCallProtection.description: Details for the Azure Operator Call Protection service on this Account.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

AzureOperatorCallProtectionAccountDetail.description: Account details specific to Azure Operator Call Protection.

enabled.description: Boolean indicating if the service is enabled on this Account.

numberCount.description: The count of telephone numbers associated with this account that have this backend service enabled.

enabled.description: Boolean indicating if the service is enabled on this Number.

BatchNumbers.description: List of telephone numbers to be uploaded to an account via a PUT request.

numbers.description: The list of numbers to upload. At most 100 can be uploaded in one request.

BatchNumbersDelete.description: A list of telephone numbers to delete.

numbers.description: The list of number to delete. At most 100 can be deleted in one request.

fullName.description: The full name of the contact detail.

email.description: The email of the contact detail.

telephoneNumber.description: The telephone number of the contact detail.

companyName.description: The company name of the contact detail.

status.description: The status of the customer relationship.

lastModifiedOn.description: The time (ISO8601 format) when the customer relationship is last modified.

Location.description: A location used by Team Operator Connect or Teams Phone Mobile telephone numbers.

civicAddressId.description: The civic address ID of the location.

additionalInfo.description: The additional information of the location.

isDefault.description: Flag indicating whether the location is default or not.

elin.description: The elin (Emergency Location Identification Number) of the location.

customSipHeader.description: Contents of the custom SIP header to use with this number. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Can be up to 100 characters in length. The name of the custom header is set as part of the provisioning platform configuration on Azure Communications Gateway.

NumberIdentifiers.description: A list identifiers for a Number resource.

numbers.description: Array containing a list of identifiers for Number resources.

serviceDetails.description: Configuration of the individual backend services for this number.

Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifM.name: If-Match
Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifM.description: The request should only proceed if an entity matches this string.

Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifM.name: If-Modified-Since
Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifM.description: The request should only proceed if the entity was modified after this time.

Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifN.name: If-None-Match
Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifN.description: The request should only proceed if no entity matches this string.

Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifU.name: If-Unmodified-Since
Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifU.description: The request should only proceed if the entity was not modified after this time.

Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to return.
